

# üßô D&D Database Entities

This document describes the entity schema based on the ER diagrams for a Dungeons & Dragons-based game system.

---

## üë• Player (Strong Entity)

| Field     | Type     | Description                |
|----------|----------|----------------------------|
| PlayerID | INT (PK) | Unique player ID           |
| Name     | VARCHAR  | Player's full name         |
| UserName | VARCHAR  | Login or nickname          |

**Associations:**

- `PlayerCharacter` (Associative):
  - PlayerID (FK)
  - CharacterID (FK)
- `PlayerAchievement` (Associative):
  - PlayerID (FK)
  - AchievementID (FK)

---

## üìå Character (Strong Entity)

| Field       | Type     | Description                  |
|-------------|----------|------------------------------|
| CharacterID | INT (PK) | Unique character ID          |
| Name        | VARCHAR  | Character name               |
| Level       | INT      | Character level              |
| charClassID | INT (FK) | Links to Class               |
| XP          | INT      | Experience points            |
| charRaceID  | INT (FK) | Links to Race                |
| HP          | INT      | Current hit points           |
| Mana        | INT      | Mana or spell slots          |
| Alignment   | VARCHAR  | Alignment (e.g., LG, CE)     |

**Associations:**

- Belongs to one `Class` and one `Race`
- Equips many `Equipment` via `CHARACTER_EQUIPMENT`
- Participates in many `Events` via `CHARACTER_EVENT`
- Fights many `Monsters`

---

## üßô Race (Strong Entity)

| Field       | Type     | Description           |
|-------------|----------|-----------------------|
| RaceID      | INT (PK) | Unique race ID        |
| RaceName    | VARCHAR  | e.g., Human, Elf      |
| bonusStat   | VARCHAR  | Stat bonus (e.g., STR)|
| Description | TEXT     | Race description      |

---

## üßô Class (Strong Entity)

| Field       | Type     | Description           |
|-------------|----------|-----------------------|
| ClassID     | INT (PK) | Unique class ID       |
| ClassName   | VARCHAR  | Wizard, Fighter, etc. |
| HitDie      | INT      | Hit die (6, 8, 10)    |
| PrimaryStat | VARCHAR  | INT, STR, etc.        |
| Description | TEXT     | Class description     |

**Associations:**

- Has many `Spells` via `CLASS_SPELL`
- Referenced by `Character` and `Monster`

---

## ‚ú® Spell (Strong Entity)

| Field       | Type     | Description               |
|-------------|----------|---------------------------|
| SpellID     | INT (PK) | Unique spell ID           |
| Name        | VARCHAR  | Spell name                |
| Level       | INT      | Spell level (0‚Äì9)         |
| School      | VARCHAR  | Magic school              |
| Effect      | TEXT     | Description of the effect |
| CastingTime | VARCHAR  | Action, Bonus, etc.       |
| Duration    | VARCHAR  | Instant, 1 hour, etc.     |

**Associations:**

- Linked through `ClassSpell`: ClassID, SpellID

---

## üßü Monster (Weak Entity)

| Field     | Type     | Description            |
|----------|----------|------------------------|
| MonsterID| INT (PK) | Unique monster ID      |
| Name     | VARCHAR  | Creature name          |
| raceID   | INT (FK) | Race reference         |
| classID  | INT (FK) | Class reference        |
| CR       | FLOAT    | Challenge rating       |
| HP       | INT      | Hit points             |
| AC       | INT      | Armor class            |
| Type     | VARCHAR  | Creature type          |
| XP       | INT      | XP given when defeated |
| MonsterID | INT (PK, FK) | Also NPCID        |
---

## üëë Boss (Subtype of Monster)

| Field      | Type     | Description            |
|----------- |----------|------------------------|
| BossID     | INT (PK) | Unique boss ID         |
| Name       | VARCHAR  | Boss name              |
| MonsterID  | INT (FK) | Inherits from Monster  |
| PhaseCount | INT      | Phases in the fight    |
| Lair       | VARCHAR  | Location of boss fight |

---

## üó°Ô∏è Equipment (Strong Entity)

| Field        | Type     | Description              |
|--------------|----------|--------------------------|
| EquipmentID  | INT (PK) | Unique ID                |
| Name         | VARCHAR  | Item name                |
| Type         | VARCHAR  | Weapon, Armor, etc.      |
| Quantity     | INT      | Stackable count          |
| Equiped      | BOOL     | Whether equipped         |
| Bonus        | VARCHAR  | Stat bonus (e.g. +1 STR) |
| Rarity       | VARCHAR  | Common, Rare, etc.       |
| Description  | TEXT     | Flavor or effect text    |

**Associations:**

- Equipped via `CharacterEquipment`: CharacterID, EquipmentID

---

## üë• NPC (Strong Entity)

| Field     | Type     | Description              |
|-----------|----------|--------------------------|
| NPCID     | INT (PK) | Unique NPC ID            |
| Name      | VARCHAR  | Character name           |
| Role      | VARCHAR  | Vendor, Questgiver, etc. |
| classID   | INT (FK) | Links to Class           |
| raceID    | INT (FK) | Links to Race            |
| FactionID | INT (FK) | Belongs to Faction       |

**Associations:**
- Located in multiple locations via `NPC_LOCATION`
- Can participate in `EVENT`
- Has Class and Race (foreign keys)

---

## üõ°Ô∏è Faction (Strong Entity)

| Field      | Type     | Description                |
|------------|----------|----------------------------|
| FactionID  | INT (PK) | Unique faction ID          |
| Name       | VARCHAR  | Faction name               |
| Purpose    | TEXT     | Lore or goal               |
| Alignment  | VARCHAR  | e.g., Neutral Evil         |

---

## üé≠ Event (Strong Entity)

| Field       | Type     | Description             |
|-------------|----------|-------------------------|
| EventID     | INT (PK) | Unique event ID         |
| Name        | VARCHAR  | Event title             |
| Date        | DATE     | Date of event           |
| Description | TEXT     | What occurred           |

**Associations:**

- Involves characters through `CHARACTER_EVENT`
- NPCs may also participate

---

## üåç NPC_LOCATION (Weak/Associative Entity)

| Field     | Type     | Description             |
|-----------|----------|-------------------------|
| NPCLocID  | INT (PK) | Unique ID               |
| NPCID     | INT (FK) | Linked NPC              |
| Location  | VARCHAR  | Location name           |
| IsCurrent | BOOL     | Is NPC currently there? |

---

## üèÜ Achievement (Strong Entity)

| Field         | Type     | Description            |
|---------------|----------|------------------------|
| AchievementID | INT (PK) | Unique achievement ID  |
| Name          | VARCHAR  | Achievement title      |
| Description   | TEXT     | How it was earned      |
| XPReward      | INT      | XP granted if any      |

**Associations:**

- Earned by players via `PLAYER_ACHIEVEMENT`
